text: Gerald "Gerry" Goffin (February 11, 1939 â€“ June 19, 2014) was an American lyricist. He was added into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1990 with former songwriting partner and first wife, Carole King. Goffin died in Los Angeles, California, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *History of Rock Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Musicians from New York City
